TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but you have to pay for the replacement of all physical Google signs.

I wish for an energy shield that will protect me from chobit-389's grandpa.

Edited April 20, 2013 by Felsmak

Granted, but it doesn't effect kinetic energy and you get beaten to death by the old man wield a set of bagpipes

I wish for all my gramp's seats back thank you very much, he's a WWII vet and almost 90 years old, he shouldn't be standing for too long xD

Granted. I don't want to hurt an old man, though, so I'll just paint them in his least favorite color.

I wish for a pencil.

Granted! I ship you one of my best 6B sketching pencils! But when it arrives it's graphite core is completely shattered.

I wish for a Donryu

Granted, but it comes without fuel and isn't painted.

I wish for a spoon.

Granted, but it is a fork in disguise, sent to monitor you by the secret fork police to find out if you were contorting with the spoons.

I wish that KSP got another gas giant already (preferably like Saturn)

Granted, but you fly through the rings and tear apart your solar panels, leaving your craft to drift without electrical power

I wish KSP had a major flora overhaul so Kerbin has trees and Eve and Laythe have small shrub-like objects

Granted, but your processor has melted and you're cooking Eggs and Steak on your computer case.

I wish that people would stop being so silly about the server DDoS and get on with it.

Granted, YOU get a DDoS attack.

I wish for infinite TF2 items.

Granted, but they're all hats and you can't trade them.

I wish for TF2 to be the way it used to be.

Edited April 20, 2013 by Felsmak

Granted, kids get their parents to buy TF2 for them.

I wish for MOAR HATS

Granted, but now hats are guns and guns are hats in TF2.

I wish that rocket fuel was edible.

Granted, they asplode in contact with human hydrocloric acid

I wish a wish was a wish but not a fish with a wish but a sish with a fish for a wish.

Granted, but now you're a fish. Congratulations.

I wish for a Kerbal plushie.

Granted, but now YOU'RE a kerbal plushie. (How does it feel?)

I wsih fro tihs stcennee to ve fxied.

Granted, by a 2-year old kid that doesn't know english

I wish for more cowbell

Granted, you start ringing your bell (LOLOLOLOLOLOLOL)

I wish for someone to grant this wish.

Not granted.

I wish I were an oscar-meyer wiener

Granted, but you are.. "repurposed" for certain... "applications" Just use your dirty mind to fill in the blanks

I wish that NASA got a lesson from the KSP engineers on how to properly run a space program.

Granted, their rockets now start spinning uncontrollably.

I wish for someone to break the rules by not granting this wish.

(Paradox, anyone?)

Granted, but you get a chocolate milkshake because what you said made my brain hurt.

I wish that I didn't need to use glasses.

(Yay, chocolate milkshake!)

Granted, but when you take your glasses off very strong lasers come out of your eyes.

I wish for a device to transport me between alternate universes.

Granted, but you decide to visit a uniferse where nothing is spelled right. You try and escape this horrible place, but the uniferse crossing device breaks.

I wish that there was a Dyson Sphere around the sun.

Granted, there are vacuums orbiting the sun

I wish for a cat that goes moooo

Granted, it will never moo when you are around.

I wish for free unlimited Wifi
